Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49582 affecting package apr for versions less than 1.7.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-49582 affecting package apr for versions less than 1.7.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package apr is earlier than 1.7.5-1, affected by CVE-2023-49582
